list.title: Special Discounts
list.description: Avail special rates & perks with these discounted tickets:
list.note: if you avail of the Student or VisMin discount online and fail to present the necessary verification at conference check-in, you may not enter the conference.

list.title: Company Ticket
list: Minimum of 5 persons from the same company
list.note: Must send company logo & proof ticketholders are from company

list.title: Student Discount
list: Online payment: please present valid ID or other proof of enrollment during conference check-in.
Offline payment: please include proof of enrollment in your email.
list.note: Must present proof you are currently enrolled as a student

list.title: Loyalty Discount
list.note: Email info@pwdo.org with proof of past attendance, then we'll let you know how much you need to pay.

list.title: VisMin Discount
list: Applicable to Early Bird & Night Owl
Can be combined with Group Discount when Night Owl goes on sale
list.note: Must present proof you currently reside in Visayas or Mindanao

list.title: Group Discount
list.description:
July 17 – September 8

Purchase 4 tickets for the price of 3! Assemble your squad to avail a great deal on FFC tickets

list.title: Community Discount
list: Gather 5 friends from the same design or tech community
Contact your community lead for the discount code

list.title: Scholarship Ticket
list: Want to sponsor a scholarship ticket? Send an email to info@pwdo.org

list.title: FFC Shirt
list.description: A specially-designed, limited-edition shirt for this year's conference

list.title: Conference kit
list.description: Badge, stickers, and other gear for a more enjoyable conference

list.title: Videos
list.description: First access to videos of the talks after the conference

list.title: Certificate
list.description: Option to download a digital certificate after the conference

list.title: Networking
list.description: Mingle with colleagues and pick the brains of our speakers

list.title: Opportunities
list.description: Meet new friends to network / collaborate with / get hired

list.title: Prizes
list.description: Take home cool swag & raffle items!
